long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Script Tag Converter" is a handy Chrome extension designed to simplify the process of converting <script> tags into raw JavaScript format. Whether you're a web developer, designer, or simply someone who works with HTML files frequently, this extension provides a convenient way to quickly convert <script> tags into plain JavaScript code with just a few clicks.

Once installed, "Script Tag Converter" seamlessly integrates into your Chrome browser, offering a user-friendly experience. The extension adds a small and unobtrusive button to your toolbar, allowing you to access its functionality whenever needed. When you come across an HTML file containing <script> tags, simply click on the "Script Tag Converter" button, and the extension will immediately analyze the webpage for all the <script> tags present.

"Script Tag Converter" provides a clean and intuitive interface, displaying a list of detected <script> tags. Each tag is accompanied by its respective content, allowing you to review and confirm the JavaScript code before conversion. You can easily navigate through the list and select the specific <script> tags that you wish to convert.

With a simple click, "Script Tag Converter" transforms the selected <script> tags into raw JavaScript code. It intelligently removes any unnecessary HTML or script-related elements, ensuring that the resulting code is clean and ready for use. The converted JavaScript code is displayed within the extension interface, and you can easily copy it to your clipboard or export it to a file for further use.

"Script Tag Converter" streamlines your workflow by eliminating the manual effort of extracting JavaScript code from <script> tags. It saves you time and effort, especially when dealing with complex HTML files or multiple <script> tags within a single document. By converting <script> tags into raw JavaScript format, you gain flexibility and control over your code, making it easier to edit, debug, or incorporate into other projects.

Additionally, "Script Tag Converter" supports various JavaScript frameworks and libraries, ensuring compatibility with different coding styles and standards. It understands and handles common syntaxes, such as inline scripts, external script files, and script attributes, providing accurate and reliable conversion results.

In summary, "Script Tag Converter" is a valuable Chrome extension for web developers, designers, and HTML enthusiasts. It simplifies the process of converting <script> tags into plain JavaScript code, enhancing your productivity and enabling seamless integration of JavaScript into your projects. With its user-friendly interface and compatibility with different coding styles, "Script Tag Converter" is a convenient tool that streamlines your workflow and saves you valuable time.
